column1: Mostly mandarin slices and juice, which means a relatively high sugar content, but still reasonably lo-cal because it has only 2% fat.
Small ice crystals (but then it is a sorbet / sherbet), and still immediately scoopable after 1 day in the freezer.

column2:
14.3g erythritol, 1.43g Tylose powder (CMC, E466), 
0.5g tara gum (E417), 0.15g xanthan (E415),
14.3g inulin, 0.5g salt.
Dense, intensive, some small ice crystals
Half the fruit, added milk + flavor doprs
